TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Rme', title = Rme', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rme'} }

S.FORM: Rme' (ke' na Plmukan: 馬)ga qsinu ru tpngan na squliq. sraral ga, ini' ta' qayat rme' ita' Tayal hiya'.
Rme' (ke' na Plmokan: 馬)ga qsino ro tpngan na sqoliq. sraral ga, ini' ta' qayat rme' ita' Tayal hiya'.
